remarks: A length 5 string is a word.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2016.)
statement:
s2cld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
s2cld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. X ) $.
s3cld.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. X ) $.
s4cld.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. X ) $.
s5cld.5 $e |- ( ph -> E e. X ) $.
s5cld $p |- ( ph -> <" A B C D E "> e. Word X ) $.
